creator: Tadamon for Social Development
descriptionHtml:
INTRO
Imagine a Jordan where any citizen can help those in need with a click from their smartphone.

Tadamon organizes fragmented humanitarian cases by verifying them and making them available on a single online platform for donors to easily support.

Tadamon is a non-governmental organization registered in Jordan that supports the needs of people who are less fortunate. Types of support include health aid, education, nutrition, environment, and more.

HOW TADAMON WORKS

Upload
Charity cases of those in need are uploaded to Tadamon’s portal by Community Contributors who then undertake a verification check of the unverified cases.

Present
Once the case has been verified, it is presented on Tadamon’s platform, including the mobile app and website.

Crowdfund
Once live on Tadamon’s platform, crowdfunding begins where anyone can donate with the click of a button on a smartphone.

VERIFICATION THROUGH COMMUNITY CONTRIBUTORS
It is through the Community Contributors (who have a range of experience in their specialized fields) that cases are either verified or rejected. Cases are assessed based on the beneficiary’s socioeconomic level and their requested need - whether medical, educational, nutritional, residential, etc.
descriptionShort: Tadamon organizes fragmented charity cases by verifying them & then raises funds

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- The design of the donation pages have been enhanced to make it easier to donate.
- The design of the login pages have been enhanced.
- You can now donate with eFAWATEERcom.
- The ‘Activities’ page now has two segments (Tadamon and Community) so you can see specific updates/info related to each category.
- Now you can easily switch between Arabic and English languages on the ‘Case Details’ page if you need a quick translation for certain terminology.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- A new Arabic font has been applied across the app making it easier to read.
- Donors will automatically receive their Donation Receipt via email upon donating.
- Some cases will have a ‘Verification Stamp’ from the Ministry of Social Development.
- A full breakdown of each Contributor’s impact can now be seen in the Contributors’ tab/page.
- While on the homepage, some cases will display a short video instead of an image.
- General bug fixes.
- Enhancements to the design.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- No need to create an account upon downloading the app. Just start browsing the app right away.
- Closed cases are now categorized as either "Fully Achieved" or "Partially Achieved"
- Browsing / swiping between cases on the home page is much smoother now.
- General design enhancements

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Now, we have distinguished regular cases from campaigns by adding a “campaign” icon on the image. You can easily filter this by selecting “campaign” in the category slider.
- A partners page has been added in the settings.
- General design enhancements
